slides.content:
### I am a doctor and I am here to test for COVID-19 virus.
We have found a few cases of the virus in this dormitory so we are here to help test all of you, and protect you from getting the virus.

We want to make sure that you are well, so we need you to fill up some basic questions about your health. Based on your answers we will be able to help you better.

Also, don’t worry about your employer or work, we will talk to them so that you don’t have to face any problems.
## We want to make sure you are well

## No matter your response, we will make sure you are taken care of.

 - Don't worry about your employer / work
 - We will talk to your employer and let you know what happens after

## Help us with some questions

Your info is confidential, only doctors will see it

qr.message: Screenshot this page or show this directly to a health worker

questions.title: Do you have any chronic disease?
questions.name: chronic_disease

questions.title: Do you have the following symptoms?
questions.name: symptoms

inputs.label: When was the last time that you checked your temperature?
inputs.name: temperature_time

inputs.label: Do you have loss of smell?
inputs.name: loss of smell

inputs.label: Do you have loss of taste?
inputs.name: loss of taste

questions.title: Have you traveled outside Singapore in the past 14 days, before onset of symptoms?
questions.name: travel outside singapore

questions.title: Have you been in close contact with a person who has been confirmed/suspected to have COVID-19?
questions.name: close contact

emergency.title: Please call us NOW
emergency.message: We would like to speak with you directly
